name: Midnight Witch
description:
The Midnight Witch cannot wait to meet you…


It was supposed to be just another day in college – you would hang out with your girl, joke with your friends, fall asleep with lectures… just like any average student.

But when a stunningly beautiful new professor shows up, your average day takes an unexpected dark turn. As it turns out, her angelic face is just a facade for her true identity – she is a witch. But not the nice kind. This one is out for blood.

You and the other students are now all trapped in this classroom, waiting for death to pick you off one by one.

Can you find a way out? Foil the Witch’s cruel game? Save the girl you love?

… can you even make it alive?

Features

  • Fast-paced narration filled with mystery and magic
  • Multiple endings based on in-game choices
  • Original art in 1080p
  • Main Theme music composed by In Uchronia, the acclaimed composers for StarCraft II competitions Iron Squid & Nation Wars

This game contains material that some may find disturbing. Viewer discretion is advised.
